summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Community Development, authorizing payment of the difference in salary rates of Program Coordinator I and Program Coordinator II for the period from September 1, 1972 through December 31, 1972 to Ms. Princess Jackson-Rustad, and authorizing payment of the additional pension contribution therefor to the City Employees' Retirement System; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
